title: Data strategy for an unforgettable Back to School
shortDescription: Back to school is a key moment in the year for Mattel's billing and its line of school products, so it is a great opportunity to approach people with relevant communication and special actions that provide value.
content:
## Challenge

Create a data-driven back-to-school campaign that would increase Mattel's market share and drive sales during this crucial retail period. The campaign needed to effectively target both parents and children while maintaining brand consistency across all channels.

## Execution

We developed a comprehensive data strategy that combined consumer insights with targeted marketing initiatives. Our approach included:

The campaign utilized advanced data analytics to identify key purchasing patterns during the back-to-school season. This informed our marketing strategy across multiple channels, including social media, retail partnerships, and digital advertising.

We implemented personalized marketing campaigns based on regional data, ensuring that each message resonated with local audiences and their specific needs during the back-to-school period.
results: +45% increase in sales during campaign period
30% increase in market share during back-to-school season
